abstract: The newest song by Kathleen Edwards, who happens to be the girlfriend of Justin Vernon, as just as good as Vernon said it would be.
snippet: The newest song by Kathleen Edwards, who happens to be the girlfriend of Justin Vernon, as just as good as Vernon said it would be.
lead_paragraph: Among the surprising revelations in Jon Caramanica's magazine profile of Justin Vernon (the man behind the band Bon Iver) in June - like the existence of a tattoo of the state of Wisconsin on his collarbone - was Vernon's relationship with the songwriter Kathleen Edwards. According to Vernon, Edwards helped keep him sane, and he, in return, was helping produce her latest record. Vernon, as you would expect, said nice things about his girlfriend: ''I would always try to write songs like her,'' he told Caramanica. ''I was never that good.''
